TitleEnglish: Inuyasha the Movie 3: Swords of an Honorable Ruler
SummaryEnglish: Two hundred years ago, Inuyasha's dog-demon father saves his human mother, Lady Izayoi from Takemaru, a samurai who had yearned for her. Izayoi and her newborn half-demon son, Inuyasha, escape from the palace, where Inuyasha's father and Takemaru died.
